researches.title: Desktop Layout System Based on Wallpaper
researches.summary: We propose a semi-automatic icon layout technique to efficiently manage a large amount of icons on a desktop. Existing desktop layout methods arrange icons in a grid using name, timestamp and type of files. Such arrangements are not very helpful for users with specific aesthetic preference, so the user needs to manually rearrange desktop icons. Various file classification methods are proposed for automatic icon layout, but they do not consider the background image into account. Our method places important file icons taking the contents of the background image into account. We extract edges and other features in the background image and place icons of important files around these locations.

researches.title: Traveling Tournament Problem for a small group
researches.summary: Recently, it has been in progress that computers calculate good quality schedules of sports competition based on opponents and locations and so on. For example, there are various ideas to create a good schedule: ``Break Minimization Problem'', which minimize to the number of continuations that teams play on the same grounds, ``Traveling Tournament Problem (TTP)'', which minimizes the sum of the distance that all teams travel. These various problems in this field are considered to be classified in NP-hard, and some of them were proved. It is too hard to complete the calculations in real time when the number of a team is bigger. Due to the difficulty of exact computation, researchers are trying not to solve exact answers, but to update lax answers iteratively using several metaheuristics methods such as genetic algorithm (GA). On the other hand, the existing softwares for TTP problems are high-cost and require expertise to correctly operate, which makes it hard for the small groups to introduce these system. Therefore, we propose a method to solve TTP problems rapidly with low cost, and develop a software which is suitable for small groups. We try to solve TTP problems quickly, saving money. TTP was compared with its similar problems, and the business mixed integer solver and the free solver were compared. Moreover, they were compared with the metaheuristics method. Thus, we found a small improvement for a small group.

pr: どんどん新しい技術をビジネスへと取り入れていきたい、と常にアンテナをはっています。直近のモバイルアプリ開発では日本ではまだメジャーではないIonicフレームワークを使い、iOSとAndroidアプリの開発を短期間で行いました。また、最新技術への知見を深めるために勉強会への積極的な参加をしており月1-2回は必ず出席し、何か発表できるよう勉強を重ねています。
